languages.text: While Close-quarters combat master Progena is active, the wearer is also immune to Slow, Immobilize and Prone.

traits.locale_text: While Close-quarters combat master Progena is active, the wearer is also immune to Slow, Immobilize and Prone.

languages.text: Под действием эффекта {g|f:613246cc28464ade9845da9b30dc65c3}безжалостное подавление{/g} персонаж получает иммунитет к {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}замедлению{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвиживанию{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокидыванию{/g}.

traits.locale_text: While under the effect of {g|f:613246cc28464ade9845da9b30dc65c3}Ruthless Suppression{/g}, the wearer is immune to immobilised, prone, and slowed.

While under the effect of {g|f:613246cc28464ade9845da9b30dc65c3}ruthless suppression{/g}, the wearer is immune to {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Giyen kişi, {g|f:613246cc28464ade9845da9b30dc65c3}İnsafsız Baskı{/g} etkisi altındayken felç, yere devrilme ve yavaşlamaya karşı bağışıklık kazanır.
Giyen kişi, {g|f:613246cc28464ade9845da9b30dc65c3}İnsafsız Baskı{/g} etkisi altındayken felç, yere devrilme ve yavaşlamaya karşı bağışıklık kazanır.

languages.text: Mientras se encuentra bajo los efectos de {g|f:613246cc28464ade9845da9b30dc65c3}Represión despiadada{/g}, el portador es inmune a {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}inmovilizado{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derribado{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}ralentizado{/g}.
languages.original_text: While under the effect of {g|f:613246cc28464ade9845da9b30dc65c3}ruthless suppression{/g}, the wearer is immune to {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Mientras se encuentra bajo los efectos de {g|f:613246cc28464ade9845da9b30dc65c3}Represión despiadada{/g}, el portador es inmune a inmovilizado, derribado y ralentizado.

languages.text: 当装备者受到{g|f:613246cc28464ade9845da9b30dc65c3}无情压制{/g}效果影响时，装备者对{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}倒地{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}减速{/g}效果免疫。
languages.original_text: While under the effect of {g|f:613246cc28464ade9845da9b30dc65c3}ruthless suppression{/g}, the wearer is immune to {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 当装备者受到{g|f:613246cc28464ade9845da9b30dc65c3}无情压制{/g}效果影响时，装备者对定身、倒地、减速效果免疫。

languages.text: Unter der Wirkung von {g|f:613246cc28464ade9845da9b30dc65c3}Gnadenlose Unterdrückung{/g} ist der Träger immun gegen {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Gelähmt{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Hingestreckt{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}Verlangsamt{/g}.
languages.original_text: While under the effect of {g|f:613246cc28464ade9845da9b30dc65c3}ruthless suppression{/g}, the wearer is immune to {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Unter der Wirkung von {g|f:613246cc28464ade9845da9b30dc65c3}Gnadenlose Unterdrückung{/g} ist der Träger immun gegen Gelähmt, Hingestreckt und Verlangsamt.

languages.text: Lorsqu'il est sous l'effet d'{g|f:613246cc28464ade9845da9b30dc65c3}Impitoyable suppression{/g}, le porteur est immunisé contre les effets {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Immobilisation{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Paralysie{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}Ralentissement{/g}.
languages.original_text: While under the effect of {g|f:613246cc28464ade9845da9b30dc65c3}ruthless suppression{/g}, the wearer is immune to {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Lorsqu'il est sous l'effet d'{g|f:613246cc28464ade9845da9b30dc65c3}Impitoyable suppression{/g}, le porteur est immunisé contre les effets Immobilisation, Paralysie et Ralentissement.

languages.text: {g|f:613246cc28464ade9845da9b30dc65c3}容赦のない抑圧{/g}の効果中、使用者は{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}移動不可{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱化{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}スロウ{/g}に耐性がある。

traits.locale_text: {g|f:613246cc28464ade9845da9b30dc65c3}容赦のない抑圧{/g}の効果中、使用者は移動不可、脆弱化、スロウに耐性がある。
{g|f:613246cc28464ade9845da9b30dc65c3}容赦のない抑圧{/g}の効果中、使用者は移動不可、脆弱化、スロウに耐性がある。
